# Cackle (Hex)
## Overview
*Cackle (Su)*: A witch can cackle madly as a move action. Any creature that is within 30 feet that is under the effects of an [[Agony (Hex)|agony hex]], [[Charm (Hex)|charm hex]], [[Evil Eye (Hex)|evil eye hex]], [[Fortune (Hex)|fortune hex]], or [[Misfortune (Hex)|misfortune hex]] caused by the witch has the duration of that hex extended by 1 round.

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 66
